mapper.insert: insert into bank_card (id, bank_number, card_number, created_time, status, login_name, is_open_fastPayment) value(#{id}, #{bankNumber}, #{cardNumber}, #{createdTime}, #{status}, #{loginName}, #{isOpenFastPayment})
mapper.select: select count(1) from bank_card where card_number = (select card_number from bank_card where id = #{id} and status='passed')
mapper.update: update bank_card set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
